mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (username, pwd, name, profile_img, email) VALUES (#{username}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{profile_img}, #{email})
mapper.select: SELECT * from member WHERE USERNAME = #{username} AND PWD = #{pwd}
SELECT count(*) from follow WHERE FOLLOWING_ID = ( SELECT MEMBER_ID from member WHERE USERNAME = #{username} )
SELECT count(*) from follow WHERE FOLLOWER_ID = ( SELECT MEMBER_ID from member WHERE USERNAME = #{username} )
SELECT m.* FROM bookmark b INNER JOIN record_bookmark rb ON b.BOOKMARK_ID = rb.BOOKMARK_ID INNER JOIN member m ON m.MEMBER_ID = rb.MEMBER_ID WHERE b.BOOKMARK_ID = #{bookmark_id}
SELECT member_id FROM member WHERE username = #{username}
